metadata.Title: CVE-2019-14851 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: A denial of service vulnerability was discovered in nbdkit. A clientissuing a certain sequence of commands could possibly trigger an assertionfailure, causing nbdkit to exit. This issue only affected nbdkit versions1.12.7, 1.14.1, and 1.15.1.

criterions.comment: nbdkit: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
